page.title: 18HOLIDAYS AND LEISURE TIME
page.content: Being located close to the river and the sea much of the leisure and recreational activity is of a nautical nature.There is also quite a concentration of holiday accommodation towards the western end of the block. This is pricipally in the form of caravans parked on permanent sites,together with holiday chalets. The area is a centre for sailing and there are large numbers of small sailing vessels to be seen on the River Blackwater during the summer months.In June from the sea wall a visitor could also watch the annual 'Barge Race' for the old sailing barges,which starts at Maldon proceeds down the river to the open sea and then back to a finish in Maldon.At Goldhanger the creek offers a mooring for small vessels should people wish to visit the village.
